trans-unit.source: Represents a batch operation on a table.
trans-unit.target: Represents a batch operation on a table.

trans-unit.source: A batch operation is a collection of table operations which are executed by the Storage Service REST API as a single atomic operation, by invoking an <externalLink><linkText>Entity Group Transaction</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dd894038.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: A batch operation is a collection of table operations which are executed by the Storage Service REST API as a single atomic operation, by invoking an <externalLink><linkText>Entity Group Transaction</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dd894038.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A batch operation may contain up to 100 individual table operations, with the requirement that each operation entity must have same partition key.
trans-unit.target: A batch operation may contain up to 100 individual table operations, with the requirement that each operation entity must have same partition key.

trans-unit.source: A batch with a retrieve operation cannot contain any other operations.
trans-unit.target: A batch with a retrieve operation cannot contain any other operations.

trans-unit.source: Note that the total payload of a batch operation is limited to 4MB.
trans-unit.target: Note that the total payload of a batch operation is limited to 4MB.
